 ∙ If she has constipation, ask her to drink more water. These side-effects are not serious.
 ∙ She should avoid taking the tablets with tea, coffee or milk as they reduce the absorption 
of iron.
 ∙ Vit. C increases iron absorption. The IFA tablet can preferably be taken with Vit. C rich
